posts.title: My first English post and my new English life
posts.text: Hey guys, what’s up! I’m Marcus. Today I decided to do something really cool. Yes, you guys got it. I’m gonna write my blog in English sometimes. And This is the first post, It is called 处女作 in Chinese, Did you know that? Haha. Maybe you guys will ask me why I do this? Cuz my English is not good and I really don’t speak much English, but I really love it, but there are no foreigners next to me. so I wanna improve it in this way.Finally, in the end, have you guys got any advice? Please message me if your answer is yes, Thank you so much, dude! What am I doing? This is so un-me! LOL

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
